summary: Adds a medium - large sized player home to the Honeyside home (Riften) via a door in the basement. Alchemy, Enchanting, Smithing, Armory, Trophy Room and Hall of Wax. Plus plenty of unique storage space. Still a work in progress but storage is safe to use.
descriptionHtml:
****WORK IN PROGRESS**** ****UPDATING****

***04.11.13 - Update 1.7 released!***

Adds a medium- large sized hideout to Honeyside in Riften.
Alchemy, Enchanting, Smithing, Armory,Trophy Room and Hall of Wax. 
Plus plenty of unique storage space.

Smithing and Armory area - Forge, Sharpening Stone, Tanning Rack, Armor tempering bench, Unique storage containers and mannequins. Plus an archery range.
Main area - Decorative statues and seating. Banqueting area.
Kitchen - 'Freezer' area with barrels for items like raw meat etc., alcohol corner, dining equipment cupboard and roasting spit. Catherine - NPC.
Alchemy and Enchanting Room - With unique storage for: ingredients, spell tomes, soul gems, scrolls, potions and poisons.
Bedroom - The usual: Bed and storage. (Almost cozy)
Trophy Room - Contains a Dragon Mask and Dragon claw display area. Daedric Artifact display, Nightingale display, Leveled items display and other unique items display. (I've almost finished putting in displays for the rest of the unique items of the game).
Hall of Wax - contains static replicas of most of the vanilla games various NPCs.

Nearing completion so will be updating as and when I have added more things!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
***Storage is safe to use as I will only be adding/subtracting furniture/clutter etc***
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Still to do list:

Still a few things to correct.
Various tweaks and changes.
Finish bedrooms.
Lighting and effects etc - getting there.
Add a few more items of clutter to the Kitchen.
Tempted to add a Hall of Dragons - Would need to be quite large though... :-/
Probably a few other things!
author: Skarz88
